data.enText: a strong negative reaction by a large number of people, for example to sth that has recently changed in society
data.chText: （对社会变动等的）强烈抵制，集体反对

data.enText: The government is facing an angry backlash from voters over the new tax.
data.chText: 政府正面临选民对新税项的强烈反对。

means: (对社会变动等的)强烈抵制，集体反对

tr: an adverse reaction to some political or social occurrence
example: there was a backlash of intolerance

tr: a movement back from an impact
come back to the originator of an action with an undesired effect
example: Your comments may backfire and cause you a lot of trouble

example.tran: 男性对女权运动的强烈抵制

value.def: A backlash against a tendency or recent development in society or politics, is a sudden, strong reaction against it.
value.tran: 强烈反应；强烈抵制；激烈反对
